name: RAION JAM!
description:
You are Raion, a cool lion who really wants to show off his dance skills. But how can you succeed? You need to be able to play with the rhythm of each song in order to successfully beat song after song to become RAION JAM! Show your moves, and make others chill!

Made by:

  1. Muhammad Daffa Ramadhani (designer)
  2. Abdan Nur Fikri (programmer)
  3. Muhamad Taufik Hakim (programmer)
  4. Satrio Pinilih (artist)
  5. Daniel Geoffrey Manurung (artist)
